event.title: is located 78 kilometres (48 mi) south of Manila and has a population of 283,468 people according to the 2010

data.event: It is located 78 kilometres (48 mi) south of Manila and has a population of 283,468 people according to the 2010 census.

event.title: years had their settlement in Bombon Lake and began

data.event: Batangueños from the early years had their settlement in Bombon Lake and began dispersing to other places when the volcano erupted.

event.title: was moving to another settlement area, the image of St. Sebastian

data.event: While a group of people was moving to another settlement area, the image of St. Sebastian was stolen from them and later on was found on a tree called “lipa”.
